title: Thursday's ETF Movers: OIH, GDXJ - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, the Oil Services ETF is outperforming other ETFs, up about 4.6% on the day. Components of that ETF showing particular strength include shares of Noble Ordinary Shares, up about 13% and shares of Valaris, up about 12.5% on the day.    makeArticleAd();  And underperforming other ETFs today is the Junior Gold Miners ETF, down about 5.5% in Thursday afternoon trading. Among components of that ETF with the weakest showing on Thursday were shares of Patagonia Gold, lower by about 18.2%, and shares of Fortuna Silver Mines, lower by about 9% on the day.
